refnamediv.refpurpose: Scan a directory containing DICOM files.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The gdcmscanner is a command line tool to quickly extract value from a set of DICOM attribute in a DICOM File-Set.

para.literallayout: -d --dir DICOM directory -t --tag %d,%d DICOM tag(s) to look for

-h --help print this help text and exit
-v --version print version information and exit
-V --verbose verbose mode (warning+error).
-W --warning warning mode, print warning information
-E --error error mode, print error information
-D --debug debug mode, print debug information
